title: [我是不是太无聊了]1.7.2命令方块6X4基岩门 体积小防熊孩子
txt_content:
本帖最后由 麦白 于 2016-8-3 21:02 编辑 



恩就是这样 把红石部分裹起来乃生存不按开关不可能过去的 对付熊孩子奇效
服务器可用哦 体积小启动快 除了方向不能变,整体结构不能变以外随便放
对了这里说一下 命令矿车的堆叠极限是29 超过可能出现一部分矿车浮空的问题
这里是存档下载:
戳我!
这里是神秘代码:

创建门:

    /summon MinecartCommandBlock ~-3 ~2 ~
    {Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~-1 ~-6 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~0 ~-6 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~1 ~-6 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~2 ~-6 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~3 ~-6 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~4 ~-6 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~-1 ~-7 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~0 ~-7 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~1 ~-7 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~2 ~-7 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~3 ~-7 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~4 ~-7 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~-1 ~-8 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~0 ~-8 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~1 ~-8 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~2 ~-8 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~3 ~-8 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~4 ~-8 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~-1 ~-9 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~0 ~-9 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~1 ~-9 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~2 ~-9 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~3 ~-9 7 0 replace"},
    Command:"/setblock ~2 ~4 ~-9 7 0 replace"}复制代码
删除门

    /summon MinecartCommandBlock ~ ~2 ~2
    {Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
    Riding:{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",
